commit.message:
re PR c++/28363 (Default template parameter causes compiler segfault)

	PR c++/28363
	* semantics.c (check_template_template_default_arg): Simplify
	error handling.

	* g++.dg/template/defarg10.C: New test.

From-SVN: r115640
